name: Fabled Style
description:
Welcome to Fabled Style, the multistyle VR rhythm game.

This game focuses on striking notes on the beat of the music using different Warrior Styles. Each Warrior Style has it's own weapons and control scheme. During a song the active Warrior Style can change multiple times to make things more interesting.

The game currently includes 3 Warrior Styles:
- Brawler: Punch notes using your fists
- Gun Slinger: Shoot at notes using your guns
- Shield Master: Block notes using your shields

There are 2 gameplay modes:
- Quick play: Quickly and freely play songs
- Quest mode: Take on challenges

Other features:
- Custom songs support (view website for download link to song editor)

Future updates of the game will include more Warrior Styles & songs.
